resources.string: This password will unlock your Cryptooly wallet only on this service
I under stand that Cryptooly cannot recover this password for me. Learn more
Don\'t risk losing your funds. protect your wallet by saving your seed phrase in a place you trust. It\'s the only way to recover your wallet if you get locked out of the app or get a new device.
This is your seed phrase. Write it down on a paper and keep it in a safe place. You\'ll be asked to re-enter this phrase (in order) on the next step.
